          <title>
            <string language="it">Riduci le Frazioni</string>
            <string language="en">Reduce Fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verringern Sie Brüche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réduisez Les Fractions</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Riduci le frazioni il più possibile. Una buona pratica nell'aritmetica mentale</string>
            <string language="en">Reduce the fractions as much as possible. A good practice in mental arithmetic</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Frazioni</string>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Verringern Sie die Brüche soviel wie möglich.

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réduisez les fractions autant que possibles.

          </description>

          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reduzca las fracciones tanto como sea posible.

          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brüche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fractions</string>
          </keyword>
